channel.title: Oldenburg 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Oldenburg 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oldenburg Fest to Honor ‘Critters’ Star Don Keith Opper
item.description: The German independent festival will screen a retrospective of Opper’s work, including the first two ‘Critters’ movies as well as ‘Android’ and ‘Slam Dance.’

item.title: Oldenburg Fest to Honor ‘Critters’ Star Don Keith Opper
item.description: The German independent festival will screen a retrospective of Opper’s work, including the first two ‘Critters’ movies as well as ‘Android’ and ‘Slam Dance.’

item.title: Oldenburg Fest to Honor Music Producer and ‘Electra Glide in Blue’ Director James William Guercio
item.description: Best known as a music producer for bands including Chicago, the Beach Boys, and Blood, Sweat & Tears, Guercio directed his one cult film in 1973.
